Thanks for the upload, however:
110-120MB for a half hour episode is too small.
The video is way too blurry and is, for me, unwatchable.

The quality of a lot of these is all over the place.  Some of them are atrociously poor, where the macroblocking is really distracting.  Small file sizes, which is nice, but with some of them it's just not worth it.  If you're a real fan, maybe look elsewhere...

a lot of good material on here, but the videos are all taken from other sources, and some are good, but some are extremely compressed and hardly even watchable. Great show, but the quality of this download is not.
